property.name: Conditions
property.summary: Gets or sets the contaning Conditions that detemine when this Constructible Object is available.

property.name: EditorId
property.summary: Gets or sets the Editor ID associated with this form.

property.name: FormId
property.summary: Gets the Form ID associated with this form.

property.name: Materials
property.summary: Gets or sets the contaning Materials for this Constructible Object.

property.name: Result
property.summary: Gets or sets the that represents the item that will be produced by this Constructible Object.

property.name: ResultCount
property.summary: Gets or sets the number of items this Constructible Object will produce.

property.name: Workbench
property.summary: Gets or sets the Keyword that represents the crafting station or bench where this Constructible Object can be used.

method.name: HasTag
method.summary: Determines whether this form has been tagged with the specified text.

method.name: Tag
method.summary: Tags this form with the specified text.
